resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/235359</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>235359</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>LO INDIRE CATALOG</catalog>
    <entry>www.indire.it</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LO INDIRE CATALOG</catalog>
            <entry>www.indire.it</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Vettori</string>
          </title>
          <language>it</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">I vettori sono oggetti matematici che costituiscono la base di tutte le teorie fisiche. Con il termine vettore si indica un segmento orientato, avente una intensità ( indicante la lunghezza del vettore), una direzione (la retta su cui esso giace) ed un verso (orientamento del vettore) che è scelto come rappresentante di un insieme di segmenti orientati, presi nel piano, tra loro equipollenti. Il Lo è costituito da una sezione lab molto ricca di contenuti ed esempi e una sezione test nella quale è possibile svogere tre differenti tipi di esercitazioni a tempo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">fisica</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="it">vettore</string>
            <string language="en">vector</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <interactivityType>
            <source>interactivityTypeValues</source>
            <value>active</value>
          </interactivityType>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>drill and practice</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>text</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>assessment</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>other</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <interactivityLevel>
            <source>interactivityLevelValues</source>
            <value>high</value>
          </interactivityLevel>
          <semanticDensity>
            <source>semanticDensityValues</source>
            <value>high</value>
          </semanticDensity>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="it">16-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <difficulty>
            <source>difficultyValues</source>
            <value>difficult</value>
          </difficulty>
          <typicalLearningTime>
            <duration>PT3H</duration>
          </typicalLearningTime>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Il LO preso in esame è costituito da una sezione LAB di stampo più teorico e da una sezione TEST dove è possibile esercitarsi. Il LO preso in esame può essere utilizzato: Come esercitazione individuale (in classe o a scuola) e come esercitazione da fare in piccoli gruppi di 3 o 4 persone</string>
          </description>
          <language>it</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc">
							<rdf:RDF xmlns="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"> <Work rdf:about=""> <License rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.5/"/> <attributionName>Attribution to be given to the licensor if present, otherwise to the author.</attributionName> </Work> <License rdf:about="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.5/"> <requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Attribution"/> <permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Reproduction"/> <permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Distribution"/> <requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Notice"/> </License> </rdf:RDF>
						</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>104</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">Physics</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>LO INDIRE CATALOG</catalog>
      <entry>www.indire.it</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>

    <item>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
